title: The Science of League of Legends (10x 750 RP giveaway)
body:
Hi there summoners!

For my master thesis I am researching League of Legends! At the moment I'm gathering data and you probably feel it coming... wait for it... Could you fill in my survey? By completing the survey you do not only contribute to my graduation but also to science!

To make filling in the survey a bit more rewarding I will give away 10x 750 Riot Points when at least 200 respondents have completed my survey. Filling in the survey will take approximately take 5 minutes.

Thanks a lot!

Survey:
http://survey.sogosurvey.com/k/RQsVTQTUsQsPsPsP

Gr.

Ridro

replies.body:
The _"how often do you play other games"_ section doesn't have a 0 hours option. I don't know if this was intentional, but it might cause misleading results.

Just thought I'd let you know :D

> [{quoted}](name=Telecasterdude,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=hUEWllt1,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-23T22:21:06.609+0000)
>
> The _"how often do you play other games"_ section doesn't have a 0 hours option. I don't know if this was intentional, but it might cause misleading results.
> 
> Just thought I'd let you know :D

if league is the only game you play you should reconsider your life choices and find out when, where, and how you fucked up to reach such a sad point of life.

OR maybe someone has such a successful life that they only have enough time to dedicate to *one* game. I mean, sure LoL is a pretty bad choice in that respect, but not everyone who plays the game has a life as crappy as yours.

???
because playing many games makes you a better and happier person?

I've got to be honest with you, I couldn't help but answer every question on page 6 with "strongly disagree".

Does that make me a bad person?

Don't know the page, but there were many many questions that got "Stronlgy disagree" or just "Disagree" on my form too.

Maybe we're both bad people.

Seems a bit grabby... yeah no thanks.

Did the whole thing and then you hit me with the:
"What is your age, country, gender, cause ya' know, we are either gonna rape you or stuff you in a plane back to Syria".

Master thesis of League of Legends. Fuck off. 

By the way still put it in the form just lied about everything.

Unless you are looking forward to raping a 69 year old man who lives in Paris and is a Jew.

Nice survery! I'm just letting you know that you might have a wrong option in one of the pages. The question was "What would you spend rp with" and one of the option says "runes". As far as I know, you cannot purchase runes with rp but rather rune pages. Overall it is a good survery and I think this actually would help you find out what the people thinks of the league of legends community and is community proud of saying "I play league of legends" and would recommend league of legends to their friends. I honestly think this survery can change alot of things just by posting the results later on when the survery ends. I honestly never recommend league of legends as a game because of the amount of saltiness in it, I also never say that the league of legends community is a good community to be part of because of certain things. I really loved the question "Are you buying rp to support riot" or something like that. If you are not posting the survery result later on, can you please tell me the result for that question, I wanna know if majority of the people buy rp to buy skins or is it to support RIOT company.
Cool survey, thanks for sharing! At the end I just put both my summoner and account name if that's cool.
